name: The Cult - Part 3
description: I've heard Peacekeeper sent you to get information about some kind of occult sect. I ain't got no interest in their sacrifices to their gods, and you have already received profit from Peacekeeper anyway, haven't you? Even though Peacekeeper is my friend, I don't like him getting more stuff than me. So, you just need to put these smart little things. It's a two-minute job, but the profit is good. Just gotta do it fast.
success_message: Nicely done! Take this, as promised.

missions.message: Place the Signal Jammer in the ritual spot on Customs
Place the Signal Jammer in the first ritual spot on Woods.
Place the Signal Jammer in the second ritual spot on Woods
Place the Signal Jammer in the ritual spot on Shoreline
